website_summaries.verdict: One of the best budget fans with a good amount of airflow produced from the plastic fans.
pros: Good for personal cooling on a tight budget
Grippy, large base adds extra security to the fan
Dual speeds for warm to hot days
Small enough to fit on other surfaces
cons: Plastic blades are easily damaged if objects get through the protective cage

customer_reviews.title: Shorts out household circuits
customer_reviews.text: The fan moved air well but is flawed when it comes to safety. It shorted out two different circuits in the house when changing the speed, so I returned it. We elected not to exchange it because we were planning to use the fan in our travel trailer and didn’t want to take a chance with a faulty design. We have had a previous Holmes fan (not this model) with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Knitingale

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is cheaply made and doesn't help at all for cooling. I sing in a band and need something to clip onto my microphone stand that will blow air on me when I'm performing at stuffy, hot venues. This fan does not do the job at all. I can have it on the highest setting and put my hand right against and barely tell there's air moving at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D Frandsen

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your application.
customer_reviews.text: This little fan moves a good stream of air. Its primary limitation is its "positionability." It has only click-stops in its rotation, so may not point exactly where you might want, for example if using it on a treadmill. And its up/down direction adjustment is even more limited and very dependent on the angle of the surface you clip it to. The other disappointment is the switch - a clumsy mechanical rotator dial located in back, not at all convenient since you are likely to be in front of it. It is corded rather than battery-powered and comes with a base if you don't need the clip. So may work well for you depending on your application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: We already have one and bought another for our daughters room. Its much quieter than our previous small fan and can easily be angled any which way. Highly recommend especially for white noise in a child's room.....or to cool your husband down at night by aiming directly at his face since he's always excessively hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Franczak

customer_reviews.title: Busted on Delivery
customer_reviews.text: We just unpacked the fan to set it up and use it-- and the bottom clip is busted where you attach the fan, the base is missing, and the wing nut to attach the fan to the clip is missing. Unfortunately, the window for returns is closed so we will have to hold it together with duck tape, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Fan failed after 3 months use in home, fixed position
customer_reviews.text: Fan bearings locked up after 3 months use attached to headboard for airflow for my dog at night. Fan blade can be turned by hand, but fails to turn with power once you stop assisting. Warranty is one year, but you have to ship the product to them, this fan doesn't cost that much to begin with, so why would i waste more money shipping it to them only to have it most likely fail again??? it does provide good, quiet airflow, the clip could be bigger. and, of course, it could have better bearings.
customer_reviews.author: H. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: this boi kicks ! Is it a desk fan? is it a clip fan? ITS BOTH. a very nice amount of air movement for the price. and you can stick this sucker virtually anywhere. the only minor downsides are that there is only 2 fan settings and the chord is one of those spiral chords that is really stubborn to stretch
customer_reviews.author: niko

customer_reviews.title: Relief from Heat Exhaustion!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan puts out a lot of air. I love its ability to be clipped when necessary yet have a stable base. The cord is deceptively long reaching. Its tilting range could be better, but for me, fan power trumps pivoting. Let's just put it this way: I'm so satisfied with this fan that I'm getting more. I've looked all over for the power in a small unit & NOW I have found it. One's going to work with me!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quiet for a cheap fan
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted an inexpensive fan for my desk at work. I've had the same one for several years and it still works perfectly. I run it for 8-10 hours a day 5 days a week during the summer at work. It surprisingly is pretty quiet so I ended up ordering several more for my camper and my parent's camper. My only complaint is the length of the cord. Its fine for a desk since typically there's an outlet available just a foot or two away, but in a camper or a room in your house you'd likely need an extension cord. That's my only reason for 4 stars, otherwise it would be 5 without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: great fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a good size for an office desk and it's just enough white noise to block out the little things. I'm able to take phone calls without a loud fan blowing directly into my ear piece (I would not recommend facing the fan directly at your mouth piece though... just like any fan, this would sound incredibly loud and annoying!) I use it in an office situation and will use it daily for roughly 6 hours a day. I will update this in a few months if the fan changes.
customer_reviews.author: Thekat0

customer_reviews.title: its a shame you have to re engineer a product that you pay good money for
customer_reviews.text: the fan itself will only tilt a few degrees ,I took a knife and side cutters and cut the plastic in a square shape (on the mount below the wingnut)now it tilts about 90 degrees.Also the coiled cord will pull it off what ever its sitting on with the base attached i straightened the cord on mine.Bottom line,its a shame you have to re engineer a product that you pay good money for.Maybe its time to buy stuff where I can really look at the product. Pros ,its been running for 30 min and so far OK and the base is a nice touch .
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie E freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good good. Good good, yes, good.
customer_reviews.text: This works well. The clip is strong and easy to move. My cat likes to chew the plastic handle for some reason. The springy cord reminds me of landline phones from the 90s, and it's pretty satisfying to twirl around my fingers and whatnot. It's very quiet... so I have to use my phone for the sleep-fan sounds. Maybe ad a little SOUND, guys? /s
customer_reviews.author: Distracting Duck

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of absolute garbage. Bought 2 in March 2019. Neither of them works now in September 2019. One of them was used 1-3 days a week, the second one was used about 5 times all year. Would definitely not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: CF 456

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this in our bathroom for about 3 years now. It is a great size and we like the clamp feature. Puts out a good amount of air. Now, though, it's of course gotten dirty and the blades take some coaxing to get turning. We tried to take it apart to clean it, but it appears to be glued together so you really can't . If you could clean it, I would give it 5 stars. As is, we will probably have to throw it away soon, which I don't like to do.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A. Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: this fan is powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bathroom because I always am hot after the shower when I do my make up and hair. I clip this on a shelf and point it at my face. This fan is small enough but it is powerful! i LOVE it! I bought another fan before this one. It was smaller and cheaper and it broke and it NEVER pumped out air. It was totally worthless. So I thought I'd pay a little more this time, and it was worth it. I'm sure this fan will last too, it's well made. Ive had it a few months and its still perfect. So happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Better than average, weaker than expected but gets the job done for small fan.  BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as strong as I'd expected based on an older similar Holmes fan I have but generally pleased. Clips nicely and fairly adjustable. Two speeds which are a little weak for a fan which plugs in but it does pretty well. Quite quiet is the benefit of it not pushing tons of air. If you are OK with average fan speed, this will work well for you. BUY.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Lasko
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Works fine, but markedly worse than the 6 inch clip Lasko fan in all measures: lunch less air flow, clip doesn’t extend as far open, head doesn’t maneuver nearly as much, cord isn’t as long. Looks a little less cheap than the Lasko and comes in black so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very nice. It's very quiet. I personally need a loud fan for sleeping purposes, but people generally like quiet fans so if that's you, this is a great fan. I Louie the stand and the clip. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because there is barely any up and down adjustment. It's better if you can point it down further or up further. Otherwise, a great little fan.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Good little fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have on my headboard. I tend to get hot at night and I wanted something to drown out the noise from my neighbors in my apartment. Holds up well and loud enough to be effective but not so loud that it’s annoying. Only reason why it didn’t get 5 stars is because it doesn’t oscillate.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Have this clipped to my daughters bunk bed. Moves air wonderfully for it's size. Makes a very nice noise. Only thing I wish is that the fan would pivot more. I've tried everything, but she's not complaining... Does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: CD_MD

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE CORD not a return coil.its a mess
customer_reviews.text: horizontal movement is OK but vertical movement is limited to around a half of an inch I won't be buying another one also the cord is just a twisted cord not a real return coil type.it is quite to run but that its only good feature choose another fan
customer_reviews.author: LaronVonBaron

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value if needed for a desk. I actually bought this to put on my night stand to use as a white noise machine. But the backfired big time because it’s SO quiet. But it’s a nice fan with a good amount of wind for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Windytulip

customer_reviews.title: No angle adjustability
customer_reviews.text: The cord is way too short. It is maybe a foot long and is coiled super tightly so even if you stretch it out, the strength of the coil can pull the plug from the outlet if it isn’t a snug fit. My biggest complaint though is there is no adjustability to the fan head. You cannot change the angle at all, meaning it blow in one level direction only.
customer_reviews.author: Glimmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space!
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan in a small office that has no register vent. It helps tremendously! I really had no other option than to try a desk fan, I just needed some air circulation. This should be all I ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Tbern

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need it for. Clips to my night stand. Or window sill. It's not meant to blow you away! But definitely drags the cold air to your direction. I need a fan to sleep. And I keep it pointed at my legs or face and it's perfect! Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to place and use. I should have done some measurement guesstimates. I bought it to use on my treadmill. I need it to be a little bigger and have a possible third setting.
customer_reviews.author: tommygemini

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The clip is much stronger than other clip fans. It does not oscillate, but moves a lot of air for it's size. Holmes is a personally recommended brand by myself as I've had many Holmes fans in the past that live up to amazing standards. Highly recommend that you purchase this fan and check it out yourself. I purchased this product at full price, and absolutely love it. I will update this review if anything changes!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good for Cube Farms
customer_reviews.text: I work in a Cube Farm: Pros: * Clips to shelf above desk which is about 3/4 of an an thick and works fine. * Not too noisy. * Two speeds. * Can adjust it left/right and up/down so if clipped to a shelf you can point it where it is needed. * Good for one person. * The clip is surprisingly substantial for such a small fan. Cons: * Wire is a bit on the short side. * Don't expect it to cool more than one person. Yes - I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cappy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, strong breeze, & clips to many surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little fans. I bought them to harden my plants, but they're strong enough to use as a regular fan. Very, very quiet, but strong breeze. You can clip it to many surfaces or sit it in its stand. I often remark what a good deal these great fans are. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kay_queen

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: have had it for about six month now, still working good, I use it for white noise when I sleep so it gets used a lot, and have found it still on upon going to bed on several times so sometimes its left on for 24 hours before shutting it down, it makes no funny rattling noises, which of course would keep me awake instead of helping me sleep. Very happy with the quality of this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan that runs almost all day. No issues after a few months. Blows a decent amount for a very small fan.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little fans. Just the right amount of white noise when I'm sleeping. I've bought several for different places.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan that one can attach almost anywhere. The cord is too short and coiled. There are three speeds and it will cool and strengthen the plants under one flourescent light about 48 inches
customer_reviews.author: Forensic Evaluation

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cooling
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. I have used it on my desk, on my bed, and on my daughters bed. So far it has proven to be useful and durable. I do wish it was more adjustable on angles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people who like constant moving air
customer_reviews.text: Great price great air movement very quite . Clipped perfectly to my head board. Bought for husband who need constant moving air now he only uses this instead of the large loud floor fan
customer_reviews.author: manuel r trujillo

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL JUNK
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT LOCK IN PLACE. THE FAN WOBBLES UP AND DOWN NO MATTER HOW MUCH YOU TIGHTEN THE PLASTIC NUT.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to turn on & limited placement.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a fan under my desk in my office. I just assumed it would work like my old one. This size is fine & it pushes plenty of air but it's a royal pain to turn on. You can't reach the knob when it's clipped on something and the knob is hard to turn as well. I wish I'd have tried it out before I pitched the box. I would've sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Great little fans I use them on my boat to move the cool a/c air around and keep thing fresh
customer_reviews.author: Al Arreguin

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you want to work on them.
customer_reviews.text: We buy these for night time noise so my wife can sleep. They have a little bushing in them that needs to be lubricated from time to time, or the fan will simply stop turning. If you pull them apart and squirt a little oil on the bushings they will keep going for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: very little range of motion, low air
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really believe the other reviews that said the range of motion was extremely limited. I was wrong. You cannot expect to clip this somewhere and be able to move the fan wherever you want to point it. Also, the air coming out on high is barely more than a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap compared to the other ones
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap compared to the other ones..but be carful of their marketing idea, when they say "oscillating" idk what they are talking about cause the fan don't MOVE, they are saying "oscillating" as the fan blade spinning... they got me, but its a nice lil fan its can come off and attact to anything with a clip...or it has a stand. BUT the cord is so short
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mackler

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to set on my desk at work. Fantastic little fan - perfect desk size. It will stand alone or clip onto something. Two speeds. If I had a complaint, it would be that it does not have an oscillate feature.
customer_reviews.author: adm

customer_reviews.title: Overall great, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 3 weeks and the fan can blow! But, a couple of small nits; 1 - Wished it had a 3 slower setting... 2 - While flexible in design, it would be nice to have a wider range of vertical tilt... 3 - Although the curly chord is "ok", it's a bit too short and does not play well with a power strip, stretch the chord and propel you power strip at the nearest in the way object! With the exception of the chord, these are all pretty minor and can work around...
customer_reviews.author: DDBones

customer_reviews.title: Senseless
customer_reviews.text: I would no have bothered. I bought 3 for a 3x3 space....I still get white mold. These are toy fans. Extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price..
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, comes with both clip on and table top bases, has 2 speeds and acually starts in low speed, whereas most fans now switch on in high then you switch to lower speeds. I'm just using it at my desk to keep me cooler at the computer. It's good and for the price, you should get one. Please let me know if my review was helpful to you. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Were perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: You get what you see. A tiny little fan that can clip onto your desk or whatever. I bought 4 of them. Were perfect for what I needed. The clip is pretty secure too. And the coiled power cord stretches a decent amount. Was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ladylyps

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good it has lasted a year... losing strength after a year ..I buy one every year ....Cant wash with water and soap because it wont work after...Must clean with a dry wipe...
customer_reviews.author: MENA

customer_reviews.title: Better and more powerful then the genesis brand
customer_reviews.text: Was more powerful then the genesis model but not as strong as the one from the 90's my girlfriend had bought for the house and less plastic then this one also.
customer_reviews.author: BOATS99

customer_reviews.title: Really ? A tight curly cord?
customer_reviews.text: Who came up with the idea to use a curly cord ? If you try to use the stand for the fan, you have to have it sitting right next to the electrical outlet, or the cord pulls it over and drags it to the outlet. Looks like they used heavy duty telephone cord. Since the fan itself works fine, if you recall for a new logical cord, let me know, please.
customer_reviews.author: soonerbroad

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of this fan.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ever gotten. not expensive, completely easy to use--not trouble at all, goes together in a flash, works reliably every time--the perfect fan for a small refreshing breeze of anywhere you spend a lot of time such as your desk or favorite reading chair--will clip on to just about anything and doesn't fall off unless you clobber it--and then five secs to put it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should and it's pretty quiet
customer_reviews.text: I can barely hear it running. Just the right size for my needs. Love the clip-on attachment and curly cord.
customer_reviews.author: Spieg

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan just wish it had on more higher speed and wished the head tilted more.
customer_reviews.author: kyle williams

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: Well it's an ok little fan but it doesn't blow much air and it is NOT loud enough to generate a fan sleeping noise that I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Newman

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little fan.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to clip to the bathroom mirror to help with the steam on the mirror after a shower. It's small and lightweight, and blows just enough air to do the job. It doesn't have a great force for much else. It is multi-directional which helps to face the fan toward the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fan. I have one sitting on my desk and now one sitting on my bed with the stand on it. It works really well for a nice little quiet desktop fan.
customer_reviews.author: bigchris143

customer_reviews.title: A good, inexpensive, quiet fan.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a bicycle trainer in the winter time, and it's perfect. Plenty of air while still being relatively quiet. I knocked off a star because of the coiled power cord style - it makes it a bit of a pain to move around. Other than that it's a great little fan at a good price. Would have been 5 stars if it had a straight/normal power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Seventh-777Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Easy return/works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought one that had some lag in it, asked to replace it and they shipped a new one right away! No complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: M.W. Rumble

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great compact fan that I use to move additional air over and around a gaming laptop that tends to run hot. According to temps monitors, it definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because there was a heat wave going on in my city and couldn’t sleep. It’s so easy to attach to anything. I have a bunk bed so u like to clip it on the the rail . The noise, well it’s a fan so it’s not gonna be super quiet. It’s great as a white noise machine as well. The curly cord can be a little annoying but it’s nice that it recoils super easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With the cord was longer or more flexible
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, only bad thing is the cord is short and the coil is so stiff it will pull the fan due to it being so lite
customer_reviews.author: nick kain

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, reliable and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Holmes fan to replace a previous Holmes fan that finally bit the dust. We had it a long time and used it constantly. We like the quality of this fan. It is quiet, dependable and has a strong clamp which keeps the fan secure wherever we put it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gelinskey

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my old school Poineer receiver placed it on top to keep it cool
customer_reviews.author: Mona Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good Personal Fan
customer_reviews.text: Just wish the control switch was in a better place. It is hard to reach as it is in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with this purchase. It’s quiet, small and perfect for my little girls room.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M Douglas

customer_reviews.title: CAREFULLY USE NEAR WATER - LIKE IN KITCHENS & BATHROOMS *****
customer_reviews.text: LIGHT WEIGHT PORTABILITY - SMALL SPACE SAVING SIZE - CLIPABLE - TWO SPEEDS - MILD & STRONG - USEFULNESS DURING SUMMER *****
customer_reviews.author: JayaGMaheshwari

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful fan for almost everyone in our office. Especially my desk is facing east and it gets really hot during summer. This fan releases the heat piled up in my area during summer.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia C. Liu

customer_reviews.title: this fan is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this fan specifically for the bathroom, to clip onto shelves and provide cool air when the bathroom is steamy. It's quiet, just a low hum and the slight fan blade shhhhhh sound. I wish the actual fan had more of a front to back tilt, but then it might tip over easily when sitting on a surface. Overall a great fan. I have another one at work.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fan. I use this fan all night, every night while I sleep. It is virtually silent and works very well. Not much more to say about it. Highly recommend! BTW...I paid full price for this product. It was not provided to me in return for a review.
customer_reviews.author: S Ray

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This fan is the perfect size for my office! It is whisper quiet. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Not too loud and moves air nicely. The clip and stand feature is dope
customer_reviews.author: John Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Maybe i got it for the wrong reason but im not completely satisfied Seems like it would be good for a office desk or on your night stand when you sleep its sound is low but it still makes sound
customer_reviews.author: Rizza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office and bedroom! I have one at work and I bought this black one to put near my bed. Sometimes the AC is too cold and this is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda from Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: A nice, portable, and easy to use fan.
customer_reviews.text: I like this fan a lot. It's larger than I had expected, and it blows a decent amount of air. It isn't super-powerful, but it's good for small spaces, or just to get a slight breeze. I especially like the ingenuity of it's clamp and the fact that it came with a free-standing base as well. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: I love the clip and stand options, but I wish the actual fan would move around a bit more. It’s not the strongest little fan, but it should do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Redreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but light speed
customer_reviews.text: For up close and personal spaces. The speed is minimal. Noise is light.
customer_reviews.author: BlackboSHEmia

customer_reviews.title: Bought, received, plugged it in and on with life!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great! This is the second one I have purchased within a month. Bought it for the home, but as my significant other saw it, she immediately wanted for herself to use at work. She loves it! Has it on low with the stand and it works like a charm. I have mine at home, using the clip and it wonderful. For the price you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: @illHate

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: Not much in the way of vertical adjustment, but it does what I need it to do- move air to help keep me cool at my desk. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Trev

customer_reviews.title: Strong little fan and clip, just make sure to measure your "ledge" first.
customer_reviews.text: The clip itself is the only thing I had a problem with because the ledge I have affixed the fan to is slightly too large, but it still works. I figure it's not a product flaw, but a fault on my part for not measuring before buying. Overall, the fan is excellent and a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: loria

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Its for my work shop! great just put on shelf, nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my desk. However, I ended up putting it on my nightstand and use it at night. It works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's simple. I needed a fan for my desk tread (it gets hot while walking and working). Nothing fancy was required. It has 2 speeds that work just fine. I didn't expect it to cool down my whole office or blow the paint off my walls. I like the option of sitting it on or clipping it to a surface; a feature many others don't have and makes the fan more versatile. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great for my desk. The clasp is strong.
customer_reviews.author: steve lubick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as described; I do wish it had a longer cord but you could always plug into an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without the metal piece that the screw - which holds the stand or clip in place - is supposed to screw into. Completely useless without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really powerful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this fan for two years now and it still works perfectly. It can be hard to clean when it starts to collect dust but that’s to be expected. I keep it clipped on my desk by my bed and it’s actually a lot more powerful than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Works great - for treadmills too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add a fan to my treadmill, as the room that I have the treadmill in does not have very good air conditioning. I taped it to the treadmill as there is not a great place to clip/attach it to, but that is not the fan's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Good for personal space
customer_reviews.text: Nice personal space fan. Pretty quiet and moves enough air
customer_reviews.author: KJD007

customer_reviews.title: Has been on almost every hour of the day for 4 years now and still working great!
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** : I came back to review this after buying it 4 years ago. It has been on for almost that entire 4 years, and that isn't an overstatement. Day in and day out this fan has stayed on outside of a few times. Left on when I leave, when i sleep, or any time im around. The few times it has went off has been when I take it to travel. This product has held up substantially well for what I payed for it, and wanted to make sure that is known. Great product for my dorm
customer_reviews.author: Dtlgolf1

customer_reviews.title: Quiet abd just the right size for one. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet abd just the right size for one. I have one in the BA at the morror. Another on my headboard.
customer_reviews.author: realreggie69

customer_reviews.title: Nice little desk fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan, quiet, powerful for it's size. I like that it comes with both the clip and the base. The only complaints I have is the cord is the spiral type not straight and that there is not much difference between the fan settings, they both feel about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design low cost fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan with option base or clip. If you don’t need oscillation, this is a great versatile little fan. I use it constantly, so I got the insurance in case it gives out
customer_reviews.author: Thos Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems good but not flexable
customer_reviews.text: The neck of the fan doesn’t move much unable to put this fan in some locations. Quality seems good
customer_reviews.author: TaejhanAceDaddy

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a fan for my desk at ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fan for my desk at the office. This works, excepts it has a curly cord which does not reach to the floor. Not a big deal, just something i didn't think to check and would have made me look for a different one. But again its a fan..
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's my travel fan, works for what it's needed for... noise
customer_reviews.author: Corey Lyst

customer_reviews.title: CLAMP IS NOT AS STRONG AS I HAD HOPED FOR ...
customer_reviews.text: CLAMP IS NOT AS STRONG AS I HAD HOPED FOR, BUT THE FAN IS SO QUIET THAT IT MORE THAN MAKES UP FOR IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's almost too good; )
customer_reviews.text: Actual quotes, "this fan is almost too cold" "I didn't think a fan this small could work this well" I bought this for a coworker who was looking for a fan for their desk at work. It's almost too good ;)
customer_reviews.author: Randall Fankhauser

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my desk at work and it works nicely. It would be nice if I could maneuver it a little bit more but it works for what I need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast! Used 2 day with prime and got the fan within 25 hours of placing the order. Fan is very quiet and moves a surprising amount of air for the size. It's great in my dorm. It rotates completely and tilts a little. Has a coiled cord that isn't very long but that's what $3 extension cords are for. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Tom Greene

customer_reviews.title: Limited life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: Used under my desk for a year with no problem. After that the motor had difficulty spinning up the fan blade and the air flow started decreasing. Finally now it won't spin up at all. I'd rather pay more for better quality than this.
customer_reviews.author: rcas94114

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fan. You can use as stand or the clip. It's not noisy, and work pretty good for a small fan
customer_reviews.author: Blue

product_meta.title: Holmes Convertible Desk & Clip Fan, Black HCF0611A-BM
product_meta.description: Color:BlackGet 2 fans in 1 with the Holmes 6 inch table/clip convertible fan. This fan is ideal for use on desk and table surfaces to cool personal space and surround yourself in well-ventilated, comfortable air in any small room. The durable grip clip securely fastens to a variety of surfaces or use with base attachment. The tilt-head adjusts to direct airflow where you want.
feature_bullets: Stand it on a desk using the base, or detach the base and use the clip
Compact and versatile, this fan is designed for personal space
